snippet: Costco said that starting next year it would stop accepting American Express credit cards at its United States stores.
abstract: Costco says beginning in 2016 it will stop accepting American Express credit cards at its United States stores.
lead_paragraph: Costco said that starting next year it would stop accepting American Express credit cards at its United States stores.

headline.main: Costco Says It Will Not Renew Contract With Amex Next Year
headline.print_headline: Costco Says It Will Not Renew Contract With Amex Next Year
